analysis.description:
PoCGame.payout (/unique_chucks/16/0x7d09edb07d23acb532a82be3da5c17d9d85806b4.sol#187-197) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- winner.transfer(ethToTransfer) (/unique_chucks/16/0x7d09edb07d23acb532a82be3da5c17d9d85806b4.sol#195-196)

PoCGame.loseWager (/unique_chucks/16/0x7d09edb07d23acb532a82be3da5c17d9d85806b4.sol#212-226) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- whale.call.value(amount)(bytes4(keccak256()(donate()))) (/unique_chucks/16/0x7d09edb07d23acb532a82be3da5c17d9d85806b4.sol#216-220)

PoCGame.play (/unique_chucks/16/0x7d09edb07d23acb532a82be3da5c17d9d85806b4.sol#143-175) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- winningNumber == difficulty / 2

Reentrancy in PoCGame.donateToWhale (/unique_chucks/16/0x7d09edb07d23acb532a82be3da5c17d9d85806b4.sol#198-208):
	External calls:
	- whale.call.value(amount)(bytes4(keccak256()(donate()))) (/unique_chucks/16/0x7d09edb07d23acb532a82be3da5c17d9d85806b4.sol#202-205)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalDonated (/unique_chucks/16/0x7d09edb07d23acb532a82be3da5c17d9d85806b4.sol#206-207)

Reentrancy in PoCGame.loseWager (/unique_chucks/16/0x7d09edb07d23acb532a82be3da5c17d9d85806b4.sol#212-226):
	External calls:
	- whale.call.value(amount)(bytes4(keccak256()(donate()))) (/unique_chucks/16/0x7d09edb07d23acb532a82be3da5c17d9d85806b4.sol#216-220)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalDonated (/unique_chucks/16/0x7d09edb07d23acb532a82be3da5c17d9d85806b4.sol#221)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/16/0x7d09edb07d23acb532a82be3da5c17d9d85806b4.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.21 (/unique_chucks/16/0x7d09edb07d23acb532a82be3da5c17d9d85806b4.sol#1): it allows old versions
PoCGame.randomSeed (/unique_chucks/16/0x7d09edb07d23acb532a82be3da5c17d9d85806b4.sol#58) is never used in PoCGame
